text: Cheirolophus is a genus in the sunflower family described as a genus in 1827.Cassini, Alexandre Henri Gabriel de. 1827. Dictionnaire des Sciences Naturelles (Second edition) 50: 250 in FrenchTropicos, Cheirolophus Cass. The genus is native to the western Mediterranean (Spain, Portugal, France, Italy, Algeria, Morocco, Malta, Canary Islands).Altervista Flora Italiana, genere Cheirolophus includes photos and European distribution maps ; SpeciesThe Plant List search for Cheirolophus ==References== Category:Asteraceae genera
title: Cheirolophus
